moves.3. Nc3: Heading for the four knights opening
moves.4. Nxe5: ?! I have played this a few times myself actually in blitz games, and lost every single one
moves.4... Nxe5: The idea being that my knights can be kicked around for a while
moves.5... Ng6: ?! Not sure what i should really be doing
moves.6. e5: The knight has only one square..g8. Too passive, so instead...
moves.6... Qe7: Pinning the pawn against the king
moves.7. Bg5: At first glance this looks good for white, but i figure out a nice trick, and my opponent takes the bait.
moves.8. Bxf6: ?? Losing the game instantly. [ 8. dxe5 Qxe5 9. Be3. ]
moves.8... Nf3#: My first ever double check and mate. Sweet
